sentences: The group met to consider the cross-cutting issue of assigned amount reporting by Parties.
Following the introduction of the draft text from the mechanisms group, SAUDI ARABIA said the G-77/CHINA was not in a position to comment on the text.
Co-Chair Plume responded that the purpose of introducing the text was simply to assist in work on the guidelines under Article 7, not to make decisions on the text.

The group then considered the section of the guidelines under Article 7 on transfer and acquisitions of emissions reduction units, certified emission reductions, and assigned amount units corresponding to work in the mechanisms groups.
Delegates discussed timeframes and modes for reporting on information under assigned amounts.
The US suggested that the FCCC Secretariat consolidate a new version of the text discussed, in consultation with the Parties.
enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
